captions.text:
>>KYLE,
COME QUICK I FOUND IT!

I FOUND THE LAMP.
>>WHERE IS IT?

WHERE'S THE LAMP, DAD?
IS IT OVER HERE?

I'LL FIND IT.
>>KYLE COME HERE, COME HERE BUDDY.

>>I LIKE THESE COINS.
>>COME HERE.

COME HERE.
YOU CAN STAND RIGHT HERE OKAY?

>>I HAVE FOUR OF THESE COINS ALREADY.
>>WE NEED TO GET THAT LAMP ALL RIGHT?

BUT WE HAVE TO BE CAREFUL BECAUSE IT MIGHT
BE

BOOBY-TRAPPED.
OKAY?

SO LET'S JUST THINK THIS THROUGH,
TAKE OUR TIME ALL RIGHT?

NO KYLE, KYLE!
KYLE!

KYLE, GIVE ME THE LAMP.
>>WHAT'S INSIDE IT?

CAN I LICK IT?
>>NO.

KYLE!
>>ALL RIGHT, ALL RIGHT,

I'M UP!
WHAT DO YOU WANT?

>>AT LAST, AFTER DECADES OF
SEARCHING I'M FINALLY

AT THE RECIPIENT OF THE GENIE'S
ALL-POWERFUL WISHES.

>>HA NO, I'M SORRY.
THE KID RUBBED THE LAMP SO HE GETS THE WISHES.

HEY.
DUDE, THAT'S MY HOUSE.

>>KYLE, KYLE...
OKAY KYLE THIS, THIS IS A VERY

SPECIAL LAMP OKAY?
SO I WANT YOU TO WISH FOR-- >>I WISH FOR A

LITTLE
CAESAR'S CHEESE PIZZA.

>>NO!
>>ALL RIGHT, ONE PIZZA COMING UP!

>>OH!
>>YOU WANT SOME?

>>YOU COULD HAVE AT LEAST WISH FOR DOMINOS!
>>I WISH FOR DOMINO'S-- >>NO!

NO!
NO!

OKAY, KYLE, BUDDY.
OKAY?

LET'S USE OUR IMAGINATION OKAY?
THIS TIME I WANT YOU TO WISH FOR SOMETHING

BIG OKAY?
>>LIKE AN XBOX?

>>NO!
LIKE A TRILLION DOLLARS OR A TIME MACHINE,

OR OKAY BUDDY OR AN ALBUM SIGNED BY THE BEETLES.
>>UH-HUH.

>>OKAY, THAT'S HIS GOATEE, STOP.
OKAY, WHAT DO YOU WISH FOR?

>>I WISH FOR AN XBOX.
>>NO!

>>DONE.
>>COOL, NOW I HAVE TWO XBOX'S.

>>AH!
>>DO YOU LIKE XBOX?

>>KYLE, COME HERE.
COME HERE.

>>YOU SHOULD COME OVER TO PLAY SOMETIME.
>>KYLE, NO.

HE DOESN'T PLAY BLACK OPS.
KYLE YOU JUST.

KYLE!
KYLE!

I LOVE YOU OKAY?
I LOVE YOU.

BUT YOU GOT TO STAY FOCUSED MAN!
OKAY?

THIS TIME I WANT YOU TO SAY EXACTLY WHAT I---
WHAT ARE YOU?

OKAY.
>>I GOT A SCRATCH.

>>OKAY KYLE.
I WANT TO YOU TO WISH FOR EXACTLY WHAT DADDY

TELLS YOU.
OKAY?

>>OKAY.
>>OKAY, OKAY.

NOW SINCE YOU'VE ALREADY TAKEN
MY FIRST TWO WISHES,

I'M GOING TO FORGO ENDLESS SUPPLY
OF MONEY AND NO NEED THE

EARTH AND I WANT YOU TO WISH FOR
PEACE FOR ALL MANKIND?

>>I WISH FOR-- >>KYLE?
FOCUS BUDDY.

YOU CAN DO THIS.
OKAY, COME ON.

WHAT DO YOU WISH FOR?
>>I WISH-- >>--PEACE.

>>--FOR PEACE?
>>PEACE.

>>PIECES?
>>PEACE FOR ALL MANKIND!

>>REESE'S PIECES?
>>PEACE FOR ALL MANKIND.

>>I WISH FOR REESE'S PIECES FOR ALL MANKIND.
>>ABSOLUTELY.

>>YOU'RE WELCOME EVERYONE.
I'M ALLERGIC TO PEANUTS.
